title: Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwich
description: A classic, quick, and satisfying sandwich
steps: Spread peanut butter evenly on one slice of bread.
Arrange the banana slices on top of the peanut butter.
Place the other slice of bread on top.
Cut the sandwich in half and serve.
notes: You can use smooth or crunchy peanut butter. For extra flavour, try toasting the bread lightly

title: Scrambled Eggs
description: A simple and versatile breakfast or light meal.
steps: Crack the eggs into a bowl
Whisk the eggs with milk or cream (if using), salt, and pepper until the yolks and whites are combined.
Heat butter or oil in a non-stick pan over medium-low heat.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan
Cook, stirring gently with a spatula, until the eggs are set but still slightly moist.
Remove from heat and serve immediately.
notes: Don't overcook the eggs if you prefer them soft and creamy. You can add cheese, herbs, or vegetables for extra flavour.
